skills.name: SOUL HARVEST
desc: • Deals 2 hits of true damage to a single target.
• Inflict Accuracy Down on the target for 2 turns.
• Grant Accuracy Up on each ally for 2 turns if they lack negative effects.
• Deal Additional True Damage to the target for each negative effect on them.

skills.name: ANGERED SPIRITS
desc: • Deals 5 hits of true damage to random enemies.
• Inflicts Doom, Silence or Block Beneficial Effects on targeted enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: METAMORPHOSIS
desc: 75% Chance to Permanently Reduce Max HP or SPECIAL on attacking enemies by 10% whenever you take damage. Permanently Reduce DEF or MR on each enemy by 50% if they have negative effects after every action. Permanently Reduce ATK or MAG on each enemy by 50% if they lack negative effects after every action. Transform All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, on each enemy into 3 Grievous Burns and 3 Scalding Burns for 2 turns if they are suffering from Stat Reduction effects, including Silver and Innate effects, at the start of battle and at the start of your turn.
